replies.body:
Wow the top 3 certainly are something else, congrats!

Btw Maraudaur, can the last contest winner win again? 
What do you think about extending the top 3 to top 4 whenever a previous winner gets into the top 3 again? It looks like Wacalac will always take a spot in there whenever he enters lol. It feels more like fighting for top 2 spots instead of top 3

I kinda miss the top 10 thing idk why they made it top 3. It's kinda discouraging when you spend 35+ hours on something and get placed with... ehh i'm just being salty lmao I guess having it be top 3 now only makes the quality of the artworks higher since everyone's gunning for top 3. Anyways gratz to the winners, Wacalac never fails to impress me lol.
Yup i feel you. It sucks when your best cant make it into the top 3.. yours was great too haha oh well.. Guess we just gotta try even harder next time
Hmm... Idk about trying harder lol I feel like I can just do simple stuff and make honorable mentions. But looking at all the submissions how did Fainaru not make it? her/his works dope D:
yeah that's what i thought too haha, it was pretty cool yet it didn't make it! I also believe he/she was the one who won the defenders of oceania art contest couple years ago?
Thats a great piece of feedback, its definitely something we will do for future contests.

There are some honorable mentions I envies, and some entries I thought would be a better on the honorable mentions side , as an artist
Not sure how my one wasn't even on the list, probably because its danwbringer riven vs nightbringer yasuo, since I thought we had to create them 2 only .. 
but
well fought{{champion:92}}

Thank you so much for the honourable mention! 
I will work harder next time to try get placed top 3! {{summoner:14}}

I've just checked the gallery and I can't seem to find my submission anywhere.. is this a glitch? I remember on the last post you said that you had received my submission {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Hey! I just double checked and it wasn't there sorry =( This morning I was having some internet/imgur issues so it looks like that upload didnt go through. We definitely did get your entry though and its awesome =D

I have added it to the full gallery. once again sorry about that miss.
Congrats to all the winners and honorable mentions!  They all look absolutely incredible.

Congratulations to the 3 winners! 
Also thank you for the honorable mention, I'll try even harder next time :)
